pages.text: The $(thing)Burpflower$() has the power to change blocks into other blocks. It can be found all around the Beneath. The Burpflower has a facing direction, which is the direction that it performs the action in. Behind it, place $(thing)Sulfur Powder$() to charge it.
Soon, if there is sulfur, the burpflower will charge, and have a yellow sulfuric flower. It then soon will make a burping sound and expel sulfuric smoke.
$(item)Pyroxenite Bricks$() can be changed into $(thing)Hellbricks$(). Charcoal piles can be transformed into $(l:beneath/ores_and_minerals#cursecoal)Cursecoal Piles$().
